name: Fabrizio Gallazzi
bio: Passionate about technology and innovation, with experience in the sales sector and a strong interest in web development and digital content creation.
hobby: I love the world of role-playing games, both tabletop and digital, and I enjoy writing scenarios and stories. I'm passionate about retrogaming and new technologies.
goals: Expand my skills in the tech industry, specializing in digital content creation and web development, with the goal of turning my passion into a profession.
